actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain ceiling fans enter duty-free and without any quantitative limitations if the competitive need limitation had been waived with respect to the fans.

summary.text: Provides that certain ceiling fans imported from Thailand shall enter duty-free and without any quantitative limitations before July 30, 2003, if duty-free treatment under the Trade Act of 1974 would have applied to such items had the competitive need limitation been waived under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain ceiling fans enter duty-free and without any quantitative limitations if the competitive need limitation had been waived with respect to the fans.
